On the other hand, moving RIGHT to (2, 7) gives me more space and flexibility. From (2, 7), I can then plan to move towards the apples in a way that avoids the enemy. This also keeps me safe from immediate collision with the enemy.

Given that this is the first turn and we have 150 turns total, I should prioritize safety and positioning for the long term. Moving RIGHT to (2, 7) provides better flexibility and reduces the immediate collision risk with the enemy.

Therefore, I'll move RIGHT to (2, 7).
